<topcClas>Family life and marriage - Social stratification and groupings</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>This project used data from the <i>British Household Panel Survey</i> (BHPS) (held at the Archive under GN 33196), to compile a consolidated marital, cohabitation and fertility file, containing retrospective lifetime histories and subsequent panel data related to respondents' partnerships and childbearing.<br> <br> For the third edition (January 2011), updated data and documentation, covering BHPS waves up to 18, were deposited.<br> <br> </abstract>       <abstract><B>Main Topics</B>:<br>The file includes variables covering childbirth, twins, unions (covering marriages and cohabitations), partners, and dates of separation or end of union.</abstract>       <sumDscr>         <timePrd event="start" date="1991-01-01T00:00:00Z">1991</timePrd>         <timePrd event="end" Families/households</anlyUnit>         <universe>National</universe>         <universe>Respondents to the BHPS Waves 1-18 (1991-2009).</universe>         <dataKind>Numeric data</dataKind>
